Registry

We are so delighted you are coming to our wedding. A gift is not necessary. Thank you for being in our lives, and celebrating our commitment to each other. If you feel you really must, well, OK. There are a couple of choices.

Honeyfund

Our dream is to travel to Scotland for our honeymoon. There is an interesting website which allows friends and family to sponsor activities like a stay at a bed and breakfast, a scotch tasting, or a meal at a nice restaurant. If you like, please feel free to contribute to our honeyfund en lieu of a physical gift.

Traditional Registry

If you prefer, we are also maintaining a more traditional registery at a few venues via this website.
